headline: AppLovin's Ad Product Growing Fast, Taking Market Share
summary: AppLovin is seeing significant growth for its advertising platform, a Wall Street analyst says. AppLovin stock is in record high territory.

headline: Ten Bull Market 10-Baggers
summary: While broad market performance has been robust, one striking aspect of this cycle has been the extraordinary gains in a handful of individual equities. Read what investors need to know.

headline: Robinhood, AppLovin, EMCOR joining S&P 500. What does EMCOR do?
summary: Robinhood (HOOD), AppLovin (APP), and EMCOR (EME) are joining the S&P 500 (^GSPC) on Monday, Sept. 22 as part of the index's quarterly rebalancing. While Robinhood and AppLovin are likely to be familiar names among investors, EMCOR may be less well-known. Julie Hyman outlines what EMCOR does. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Stock Market News for Sep 22, 2025
summary: U.S. stock markets closed at record highs on Friday following the Fed rate cut last week and indications for further easing of policies.
